titleStmt.title: Rapta Tatio The mirrour of his Maiesties present gouernment, tending to the vnion of his whole iland of Brittonie martiall.
titleStmt.author: Skinner, John, Sir, fl. 1604, attributed name.
Skene, John, Sir, 1543?-1617, attributed name.
Douglas, N., attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. W[hite] for S. Waterson,

notesStmt.note: Variously attributed to Sir John Skinner, to Sir John Skene, and to N. Douglas. See Halkett & Laing, 3rd ed., p. 164.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
B4 is a cancel in all copies. It is set in duplicate; recto line 8 ends (1) "friendes," or (2) "frindes,".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
